mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NVL(USER_PWD, '') AS USER_PWD, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(USER_ADDRESS, '') AS USER_ADDRESS, NVL(USER_AGE, 0) AS USER_AGE, NVL(USER_GENDER, '') AS USER_GENDER, NVL(USER_PHONE_NUMBER, '') AS USER_PHONE_NUMBER, NVL(STATUS, 'N') AS STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(USER_ACCOUNT, '') AS USER_ACCOUNT, NVL(USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(USER_NICKNAME, '') AS USER_NICKNAME, NVL(FILE_EXT, '') AS FILE_EXT FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND STATUS != 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADDRESS, USER_AGE, USER_GENDER, USER_PHONE_NUMBER, STATUS, REG_DATE, USER_ACCOUNT, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{email}, #{userAddress}, #{userAge}, #{userGender}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{status}, SYSDATE, #{userAccount}, #{userName}, #{userNickname} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress}, USER_AGE = #{userAge}, USER_GENDER = #{userGender}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
